description: You’ll love my place because of the location, 50ft from the A, C and 1 train, 15-20 mins to times square. fully equipped kitchen. couch, wifi, cable, queen bed, AC,TV, closet, bathroom tube/shower, hair dryer, towels, iron. You'll see all kind of nice people, Latino area with a lot of different flavors. in the neighborhood you'll find all kind of restaurants, bars, banks, grocery stores, hospital, coffee shops. The appartment is located in a 3rd floor with no elevator.
name: Up town Manhhatan, nice and comfy one bedroom apt
review: I had a fantastic experience here! The place is clean and spacious, right around the corner from the subway and a convenient store, which is incredibly helpful, and Ronny is great about communication. Hands down, my best time in New York, and staying here was definitely a factor in that. I will stay here again and again if I can!
